lead_paragraph: The woman, Leila Aquino, was already the subject of a New York City child welfare agency inquiry into whether the girl had previously been left unattended.

headline.print_headline: Woman Whose Daughter, 2, Died Alone in Fire Was Subject of Inquiry
headline.main: Woman Whose Daughter, 2, Died Alone in Fire Was Under Investigation

snippet: The woman, Leila Aquino, was already the subject of a New York City child welfare agency inquiry into whether the girl had previously been left unattended.
abstract: New York City law enforcement official says Leila Aquino, woman whose young daughter Kalenah Muldrow died in fire after being left alone at home, was already being actively investigated by Administration for Children's Services in connection with reports she had previously left her daughter unattended.
